text: Dear Zindagi () is a 2016 Indian Hindi-language coming-of-age romantic comedy drama movie written and directed by Gauri Shinde. It was produced by Gauri Khan, Karan Johar, and Shinde under the banners of Red Chillies Entertainment, Dharma Productions, and Hope Productions respectively. The film stars Alia Bhatt and Shah Rukh Khan in lead roles, while Ira Dubey, Kunal Kapoor, Angad Bedi, Ali Zafar, Yashaswini Dayama and Rohit Suresh Saraf are playing the supporting roles. Dear Zindagi released worldwide on 25 November 2016 and received positive reviews and was a success at the box office. The audience loved Alia Bhatt and Shah Rukh Khan's performances a lot. == Cast == * Alia Bhatt as Kaira * Shah Rukh Khan as Dr. Jehangir "Jug" Khan * Ali Zafar as Rumi * Ira Dubey as Fatima * Yashaswini Dayama as Jackie * Gautmik as Ganju * Yashwant Singh as Kaira's uncle * Salone Mehta as Kaira's aunt * Baby Dishita as little Kaira * Nitika Anand as family friend * Rohit Suresh Saraf as Kiddo * Amit Nagraj as little Kiddo * Aban Deohans as Kaira's mother * Atul Kale as Kaira's father * Martha Xavier Fernandes as Kaira's maternal grandmother * Madhav Vaze as Kaira's maternal grandfather * Kunal Kapoor as Raghuvendra * Angad Bedi as Sid * Ivan Sylvester Rodrigues as vice president of a hotel * Akanksha Gade as maid Alka * Aditya Roy Kapur as a furniture dealer (guest appearance) == References == Category:2010s Indian movies
title: Dear Zindagi
